name: Fish Solitaire
description:
Adorable fish are in danger now, please help them!

You find a way playing Solitaire Klondike card game! Let's build a comfy aquarium for your lovely fish in the underwater world!

What you can do in Fish Solitaire:
• Enjoy a variety of fun mini games
• Collect fish from all over the world
• Feed fish in the aquarium simulator
• Design home for the lovely fish
• Create your dream aquarium

Feature of Fish Solitaire:
• Playable Offline & Free
• Unlimited free undo & hints
• Support Left-Hand & Turn 3 mode
• Autocomplete & 100% Winnable
• Great for training the brain

We want to hear from you! Any feedback on Solitaire Fish free game, please contact us at: SolitaireOcean@linkdesks.com

A big THANK YOU goes out to our beloved players!
